metadata.name: Suggestions #1
metadata.description:
*Suggestions* is a set from the series *Detremura*, by Pedro Victor Brandão. The works were commissioned for the exhibition *Non-Fungible Castle 2022: Preserving Culture On The Blockchain*, curated by Jake Al-Haffar at the Lobkowicz Palace in Prague, Czech Republic, from October 27 to November 13, 2022.

*Suggestions #1* is a 10-minute recording of Instagram’s search tab recommended content to a newly created account in a device that was geo-spoofed to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.  
 
Title: *Suggestions #1*, from *Detremura* series  
Artist: Pedro Victor Brandão  
Medium: Tokenized digital video  
Dimensions: 1920x1080px@30fps  
Length: 10’  
Edition: Unique  
Year: 2022
